◆ LOOP_BODY

#define LOOP_BODY
Value:
const uint32_t d = get_depth<format, bpp>(inimg, x, y, stride, h); \
depths[idx] = d; \
if (d >= Far) { \
haveFar = true; \
} else { \
if (d < mindepth) \
mindepth = d; \
if (d > maxdepth) \
maxdepth = d; \
}
